document_data.name: Eibrancha
document_data.mainbody: '''Eibrancha''' was a planet located within an unknown [[crystal sphere]], for which barely any recorded information existed.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[planewalker|Planewalking]] [[wizard]]s that investigated life on this planet reported that its inhabitants were largely ordinary folk and that 'heroes' were a rare occurrence. Life in general on the planet was said to be incredibly dull and ordinary.
document_data.History: Around [[1281 DR]], a group of [[adventurer]]s traveling across [[Icewind Dale]] discovered an [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[Bren Muller's Crossbow|crossbow]] made of purple wood. Sages believed this wood came from a unique variety of tree on Eibrancha.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants: * [[Bren Muller]], an educated man whom sages believed came from this planet. He once owned an enchanted crossbow that was later discovered by adventurers in Icewind Dale.
